Package org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning

Copyright (c) 2012 GigaSpaces Technologies Ltd.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CustomNode Interface for a custom cloud node, used for example by the BYON cloud driver.
CustomServiceDataAware Deprecated.
ManagementLocator Deprecated.
ManagementProvisioningContext Provisioning context interface for management provisioning commands.
ProvisioningContext Context for agent provisioning request.
ProvisioningDriver Deprecated.
ProvisioningDriverBootstrapValidation Deprecated.
ProvisioningDriverListener A Listener for all published events in the DefaultProvisioningDriver class.
 

Class Summary
BaseComputeDriver Base class for all compute driver implementations.
BaseProvisioningDriver  
CloudDriverSupport Deprecated.
ComputeDriverConfiguration Configuration of a cloud driver instance.
ComputeDriverProvisioningAdapter Adapter class from the deprecated cloud driver interface to the new compute driver base class.
ElasticMachineProvisioningCloudifyAdapter An ESM machine provisioning implementation used by the Cloudify cloud driver.
MachineDetailsDocumentConverter Converts Machine Details to Space documents (and back).
PersistentMachineDetails An extension of Machine Details that is safe to use with the SpaceDocumentConverter.
ProvisioningContextAccess Provides access to the provisioning context of the currently running provisioning request.
ProvisioningContextImpl Implementation of the provisioning context interface for both agent and manager machines.
RequestRateLimiter This rate limiter is designed to allow a specific number of request attempts in a defined period of time.
 

Exception Summary
CloudProvisioningException Exception class for provisioning related exceptions.
